title: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister to Go on 9-Day Japan, South Korea Tour
content:
File Photo: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan 
Bhopal: To attract foreign investment in Madhya Pradesh, Chief Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan will embark on a nine-day tour of Japan and South Korea from tomorrow. 
Accompanied by a high-level delegation including Minister for Industries Yashodhara Raje Scindia and CM's secretary Vivek Agrawal, Mr Chouhan will leave from Bhopal today, an official of Public Relation department said.
